mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoChatInq Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CHAT_INQ_SN , INQ_TP_CD , MBR_NO , INQ_CSTMR_NM , INQ_SJ , PRCS_COMPT_DT , SENARIO_CHAT_YN , CHAT_TICKET_ID , CHAT_TRANS_YN , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , LDIN_PATH_SECT_CD , LDIN_MEDIA_TP_CD , LDIN_SCRIN_SECT_CD , ANS_EVL_CD , ANS_EVL_CONT , ANS_EVL_WRITNG_DT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_CONT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_DT , UTID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CHAT_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CHAT_INQ_SN = #{chatInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoChatInq Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_CHAT_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CHAT_INQ_SN = #{chatInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
